main event: Multiple witnesses observed reddish-orange shaped objects with long tails, traveling at high speeds and disappearing and reappearing in the sky near Bitburg, Germany.
interesting points: The objects were half the size of the moon and bright yellow-orange in color., The sighting lasted approximately 3-5 seconds., The observers reported that the objects moved from the ground to high altitudes., Several independent witnesses confirmed the sighting., The event might be attributed to a meteor.
witness description: SSGT Donald E. Metz and SSGT Richard D. Smith, both Air Policemen with the 36th Air Police Squadron.
